name: nestjs-oidc-identity
description: nestjs openid connect client identity module.
author: Hubert<yi.xiang@live.com>

scripts.build: run -T rimraf dist && yarn build:version && yarn build:cjs && yarn build:esm
scripts.release:major: npm version $(run -T semver $npm_package_version -i major) && yarn build && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.release:minor: npm version $(run -T semver $npm_package_version -i minor) && yarn build && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.release:patch: npm version $(run -T semver $npm_package_version -i patch) && yarn build && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.release:alpha: npm version $(run -T semver $npm_package_version -i prerelease --preid alpha ) && yarn build && npm publish --tag alpha
scripts.release:beta: npm version $(run -T semver $npm_package_version -i prerelease --preid beta ) && yarn build && npm publish --tag beta
